p.s: The article Globalised Environmental Pollution - Causes and Effects written by Ankita Mitra and published on Blog of Environment in February 2014 deals with the many Aspectsaspects of environmental pollution and its background.
Ankita Mitra describes the environmental pollution as heartbreaking because everyone knows about it, but she also thinks, that it shows how the industrialisation got out of control.
There are a lot of causes on.
First of all there's the introduction of harmful pollutants into the environment and the small behind vehicular traffic, synthetic detergents, nitrogen fertilizers or insecticides in air and water.
Behind all this stands the rapidly increasing urbanization and rapidly increasing industrialization.
She also describes all the effects the environmental pollution has on planet earth.
